name: Sealed Sending
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Inner Sea Intrigue © 2016, Paizo Inc.
range: unlimited effect one non-magical parchment with a written message
text: You create a scroll bearing a message in any language you can speak, with a maximum length of 50 words. The scroll magically appears anywhere you have viewed at least once on the same plane of existence you are on now. When the spell ends or when the message has been read completely, the scroll disintegrates, leaving no trace. This spell cannot be detected, traced, or blocked by any spell of a lower level.
target_zh: 一张写有讯息的非魔法羊皮纸
text_zh: 你创造出一个写有讯息的卷轴，上面可以是任何你能说的语言，最长为50个词。这个卷轴会被魔法传送到同一位面中你至少看过一次的地方。当法术结束或讯息被完全读完时，卷轴会分解，不留一丝痕迹。这个法术不能被任何更低等级的法术侦测，追踪，或封锁。
